apiservice.name: Aesir E-Commerce - Category Webservice

apiservice.description: Maintain the global product category tree.

create.description: This operation creates a new Aesir E-Commerce Category

field.name: id
field.description: Category ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: name
field.description: Category name

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: company_id
field.description:
Owner company of this category - if null, it belongs to the main warehouse.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.description: URL of image to import into the server for displaying for the category

field.description: Category description

field.description: When true, it populates the local_fields field with the id of association fields. Otherwise, the field will remain empty.
